title: chore: Add build script for generating manpage and completions
body:
## Description
Add `build.rs` for generating manpage and shell completions at build time. Utilize `clap_mangen` and `clap_complete`.

- `target/man`: contains the manpage
- `target/completions`: contains the shell completions

## Motivation and Context
Updating the manpage with each command-line change is a maintenance burden. After switching to clap4, it makes sense to let it generate the manpage.
While we're at it, we can also generate shell completions.

## How Has This Been Tested?
`cargo build`
